thread.title: Disney Doodle: Esmeralda Dances Through Epcot
thread.title_full: Disney Doodle: Esmeralda Dances Through Epcot

author: Jennifer Fickley-Baker
title: Disney Doodle: Esmeralda Dances Through Epcot
text:
Our Disney Doodle series allows our team of artists to imagine what a Disney character would do first if they had the chance to visit a Disney theme park . 
This week’s Doodle focuses on Esmeralda, the heroine gypsy from the 1996 film “ The Hunchback of Notre Dame .” In the film, Esmeralda’s spirited dancing helped her make a living – and occasionally served as a means of escape from the villain, Frollo. 
Here, artist Ashley Taylor imagines what Esmeralda would do if she had the chance to visit Epcot . 
“Every time I spend time in the France Pavilion at Epcot, I imagine Esmeralda dancing up and down the passageways. I imagine she would have a fun time performing for the guests with Djali!”
